original: 'du byed kyi dbyings kyis chos kyi dbyings yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: 'du byed kyi dbyings kyis chos kyi dbyings yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: The realm of compositional activity does not see the realm of phenomena.

original: chos kyi dbyings kyis 'du byed kyi dbyings yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //🔽rnam par shes pa'i dbyings kyis chos kyi dbyings yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings kyis 'du byed kyi dbyings yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // rnam par shes pa'i dbyings kyis chos kyi dbyings yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: The realm of phenomena does not see the realm of compositional activity.🔽The realm of consciousness does not see the realm of phenomena.

original: chos kyi dbyings kyis rnam par shes pa'i dbyings yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings kyis rnam par shes pa'i dbyings yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: The realm of phenomena does not see the realm of consciousness.

original: mig gi dbyings kyis chos kyi dbyings yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: mig gi dbyings kyis chos kyi dbyings yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: The realm of the eyes does not see the realm of phenomena.

original: chos kyi dbyings kyis mig gi dbyings yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //🔽rna ba'i dbyings kyis chos kyi dbyings yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings kyis mig gi dbyings yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // rna ba'i dbyings kyis chos kyi dbyings yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: The realm of phenomena does not see the realm of the eyes.🔽The realm of the ears does not see the realm of phenomena.

original: chos kyi dbyings kyis rna ba'i dbyings yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings kyis rna ba'i dbyings yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: The realm of phenomena does not see the realm of the ears.

original: sna'i dbyings kyis chos kyi dbyings yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: sna'i dbyings kyis chos kyi dbyings yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: The realm of the nose does not see the realm of phenomena.

original: chos kyi dbyings kyis sna'i dbyings yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //🔽lce'i dbyings kyis chos kyi dbyings yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings kyis sna'i dbyings yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // lce'i dbyings kyis chos kyi dbyings yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: The realm of phenomena does not see the realm of the nose.🔽The realm of the tongue does not see the realm of phenomena.

original: chos kyi dbyings kyis lce'i dbyings yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //🔽lus kyi dbyings kyis chos kyi dbyings yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings kyis lce'i dbyings yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // lus kyi dbyings kyis chos kyi dbyings yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: The realm of phenomena does not see the realm of the tongue.🔽The realm of the body does not see the realm of phenomena.

original: chos kyi dbyings kyis lus kyi dbyings yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //🔽yid kyi dbyings kyis chos kyi dbyings yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings kyis lus kyi dbyings yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // yid kyi dbyings kyis chos kyi dbyings yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: The realm of phenomena does not see the realm of the body.🔽The realm of the mind does not see the realm of phenomena.

original: @427b chos kyi dbyings kyis yid kyi dbyings yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: @427b chos kyi dbyings kyis yid kyi dbyings yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: The realm of phenomena does not see the realm of the mind.

original: rab 'byor / 'dus byas kyi dbyings kyis 'dus ma byas kyi dbyings yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'dus byas kyi dbyings kyis 'dus ma byas kyi dbyings yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: Subhūti, the compounded realm does not see the uncompounded realm.

original: 'dus ma byas kyi dbyings kyis 'dus byas kyi dbyings yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //🔽'dus byas kyi dbyings ma yin par yang 'dus ma byas kyi dbyings rab tu gdags par mi nus so //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas kyi dbyings kyis 'dus byas kyi dbyings yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // 'dus byas kyi dbyings ma yin par yang 'dus ma byas kyi dbyings rab tu gdags par mi nus so //
translated: the unconditioned element does not see the conditioned element.🔽The unconditioned element cannot be designated apart from the conditioned element.

original: 'dus ma byas kyi dbyings ma yin par yang 'dus byas kyi dbyings rab tu gdags par mi nus te /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas kyi dbyings ma yin par yang 'dus byas kyi dbyings rab tu gdags par mi nus te /
translated: The conditioned element cannot be designated apart from the unconditioned element.

original: rab 'byor / de ltar na /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar na /
translated: Subhūti, in that way

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /🔽chos gang yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe / chos gang yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
translated: when bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom🔽they do not see any dharma at all.

original: yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas /
analyzed: yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas /
translated: Not seeing any dharma at all,

original: mi 'jigs mi dngangs skrag par mi 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: mi 'jigs mi dngangs skrag par mi 'gyur zhing /
translated: they do not tremble, feel frightened, or become terrified.

original: de'i sems chos gang la'ang zhum par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: de'i sems chos gang la'ang zhum par mi 'gyur /
translated: Their minds do not shrink from any dharma.

original: yid 'gyod par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yid 'gyod par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: They do not have any regrets.

original: rab 'byor / de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Subhūti, why is that?

original: 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe gzugs yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //🔽tshor ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe gzugs yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // tshor ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: “Thus, when great bodhisattva beings practice the transcendent perfection of wisdom, they do not consider physical forms.🔽They do not consider feelings.

original: 'du shes yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: 'du shes yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: They do not consider perceptions.

original: 'du byed yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: 'du byed yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: They do not consider formative predispositions.

original: rnam par shes pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //🔽mig yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // mig yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: They do not consider consciousness.🔽They do not consider the eyes.

original: rna ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //🔽sna yang dag par rjes @428a *//🔽su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: rna ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // sna yang dag par rjes @428a *// su mi mthong ngo //
translated: They do not consider the ears.🔽They do not consider the nose.

original: lce yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: lce yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: They do not consider the tongue.

original: lus yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: lus yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: They do not consider the body.

original: yid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //🔽gzugs yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: yid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // gzugs yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: They do not consider the mental faculty.🔽They do not consider sights.

original: sgra yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: sgra yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: They do not consider sounds.

original: dri yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //🔽ro yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: dri yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // ro yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: He does not consider smells to be real.🔽He does not consider tastes to be real.

original: reg yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: reg yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: He does not consider tactile objects to be real.

original: chos yang dag rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: chos yang dag rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: He does not consider mental phenomena to be real.

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: He does not consider eye consciousness to be real.

original: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //🔽sna'i rnam par shes pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // sna'i rnam par shes pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: He does not consider ear consciousness to be real.🔽He does not consider nose consciousness to be real.

original: lce'i rnam par shes pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: lce'i rnam par shes pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: He does not consider tongue consciousness to be real.

original: lus kyi rnam par shes pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: lus kyi rnam par shes pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: He does not consider body consciousness to be real.

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //🔽mig gi 'dus te reg pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // mig gi 'dus te reg pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: He does not consider mind consciousness to be real.🔽He does not consider eye contact to be real.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: He does not consider ear contact to be real.

original: sna'i 'dus te reg pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: sna'i 'dus te reg pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: They do not see the union of nose and smell.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: They do not see the union of tongue and taste.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yang dag par @428b rjes su mi mthong ngo //🔽sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yang dag par @428b rjes su mi mthong ngo // sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: They do not see the feeling that arises from the union of ear, sound, and ear-consciousness.🔽They do not see the feeling that arises from the union of nose, smell, and nose-consciousness.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: They do not see the feeling that arises from the union of tongue, taste, and tongue-consciousness.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: They do not see the feeling that arises from the union of body, touch, and body-consciousness.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //🔽sa'i khams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // sa'i khams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //

original: chu'i khams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: chu'i khams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //

original: me'i khams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //🔽rlung gi khams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: me'i khams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // rlung gi khams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //

original: nam mkha'i khams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //

analyzed: ma rig pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: He does not see ignorance.

original: 'du byed yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: 'du byed yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //

original: rnam par shes pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //

analyzed: tshor ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // sred pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: He does not see feeling.🔽He does not see craving.

analyzed: len pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // srid pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //

translated: “A bodhisattva great being who wants to complete the emptiness of non-things should train in the perfection of wisdom.🔽A bodhisattva great being who wants to complete the emptiness of essential nature should train in the perfection of wisdom.

translated: A bodhisattva great being who wants to complete the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an essential nature should train in the perfection of wisdom.

translated: A bodhisattva great being who wants to complete the four applications of mindfulness should train in the perfection of wisdom.

translated: “A bodhisattva great being who wants to complete the ten tathāgata powers should train in the perfection of wisdom.

analyzed: mi 'jigs pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par bgyi bar 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o //
translated: “A bodhisattva great being who wishes to perfect the four fearlessnesses should train in the perfection of wisdom.

original: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par bgyi bar 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o //🔽byams @438b pa chen po yongs su rdzogs par bgyi bar 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o //

translated: “A bodhisattva great being who wishes to perfect the four detailed and thorough knowledges should train in the perfection of wisdom.🔽“A bodhisattva great being who wishes to perfect great love should train in the perfection of wisdom.

original: snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par bgyi bar 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o //
analyzed: snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par bgyi bar 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o //
translated: “A bodhisattva great being who wishes to perfect great compassion should train in the perfection of wisdom.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs par bgyi bar 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs par bgyi bar 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o //
translated: “The bodhisattva mahāsattvas who wish to perfect the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha should train in the perfection of wisdom.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas te /
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas te /
translated: “They should abide in the samādhi endowed with the branches of enlightenment.

original: bsam gtan dang po las langs nas 'gog pa la mnyam par bzhag pa dang / 'gog pa las langs nas bsam gtan gnyis pa la mnyam par bzhag pa dang / bsam gtan gnyis pa las langs nas 'gog pa la mnyam par bzhag pa dang / 'gog pa las langs nas bsam gtan gsum pa la mnyam par bzhag pa dang /
analyzed: bsam gtan dang po las langs nas 'gog pa la mnyam par bzhag pa dang / 'gog pa las langs nas bsam gtan gnyis pa la mnyam par bzhag pa dang / bsam gtan gnyis pa las langs nas 'gog pa la mnyam par bzhag pa dang / 'gog pa las langs nas bsam gtan gsum pa la mnyam par bzhag pa dang /
translated: They should rise from the first concentration and rest in equipoise in cessation, and they should rise from cessation and rest in equipoise in the second concentration, and they should rise from the second concentration and rest in equipoise in cessation, and they should rise from cessation and rest in equipoise in the third concentration,

original: bsam gtan gsum pa las langs nas 'gog pa la mnyam par bzhag pa dang / 'gog pa las langs nas bsam gtan bzhi pa la mnyam par bzhag pa dang; bsam gtan bzhi pa las langs nas 'gog pa la mnyam par bzhag pa dang / 'gog pa las langs nas byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag pa dang /

translated: he rose from the fourth concentration and entered meditative absorption in cessation,🔽he rose from cessation and entered meditative absorption in the concentration of loving kindness,🔽he rose from the concentration of loving kindness and entered meditative absorption in cessation,🔽he rose from cessation and entered meditative absorption in the concentration of compassion,

translated: he rose from the concentration of compassion and entered meditative absorption in cessation,

original: 'gog pa las langs nas dga' ba'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag pa dang / dga' ba'i ting nge 'dzin las langs nas 'gog pa la mnyam par bzhag pa dang / 'gog pa las langs nas btang snyoms kyi ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag pa dang /

translated: having risen from cessation, to rest in equipoise in the meditative absorption of joy;🔽having risen from the meditative absorption of joy, to rest in equipoise in cessation; having risen from cessation, to rest in equipoise in the meditative absorption of equanimity;

original: btang snyoms kyi ting nge 'dzin las langs nas 'gog pa la mnyam par bzhag pa dang / 'gog pa las langs nas nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la mnyam par bzhag pa dang; nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las langs nas 'gog pa la mnyam par bzhag pa dang /
analyzed: btang snyoms kyi ting nge 'dzin las langs nas 'gog pa la mnyam par bzhag pa dang / 'gog pa las langs nas nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la mnyam par bzhag pa dang; nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las langs nas 'gog pa la mnyam par bzhag pa dang /
translated: having risen from the meditative absorption of equanimity, to rest in equipoise in cessation; having risen from cessation, to rest in equipoise in the sense field of infinite space; having risen from the sense field of infinite space, to rest in equipoise in cessation;

original: 'gog pa las langs nas cung zad med pa'i skye mched la mnyam par bzhag pa dang / cung zad med pa'i skyed mched las langs nas 'gog pa la mnyam par bzhag pa dang / 'gog pa las langs nas rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la mnyam par bzhag pa dang /

translated: having risen from cessation, to enter meditative absorption in the sphere of nothingness;🔽having risen from the sphere of nothingness, to enter meditative absorption in cessation; having risen from cessation, to enter meditative absorption in the sphere of infinite consciousness;🔽having risen from the sphere of infinite consciousness, to enter meditative absorption in cessation; having risen from cessation, to enter meditative absorption in the sphere of neither perception nor non-perception;

translated: having risen from the sphere of neither perception nor non-perception, to enter meditative absorption in cessation.🔽“

translated: “A bodhisattva great being who wishes to enter the samādhi of the lion’s yawn should train in the perfection of wisdom.🔽A bodhisattva great being who wishes to enter the samādhi of the lion’s play should train in the perfection of wisdom.

original: dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag par 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o //
analyzed: dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag par 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o //
translated: A bodhisattva great being who wishes to attain all the dhāraṇī gateways and samādhi gateways should train in the perfection of wisdom.🔽A bodhisattva great being who wishes to enter the samādhi of the heroic walk should train in the perfection of wisdom.

original: rin chen phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag par 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o //🔽zla ba'i 'od kyi ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag par 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos @440a *//

translated: “A bodhisattva great being who wishes to rest in the meditative absorption of the precious seal should train in the perfection of wisdom.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o //
translated: A bodhisattva great being who wishes to rest in the meditative absorption of the light of the moon should train in the perfection of wisdom.

original: zla ba'i rgyal mtshan dpal gyi ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag par 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o //

translated: A bodhisattva great being who wishes to rest in the meditative absorption of the glory of the moon’s banner should train in the perfection of wisdom.

original: chos thams cad phyag rgyar gyur pa'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag par 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o //
analyzed: chos thams cad phyag rgyar gyur pa'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag par 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o //
translated: A bodhisattva great being who wishes to rest in the meditative absorption of the seal of all phenomena should train in the perfection of wisdom.

original: spyan ras gzigs kyi phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag par 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o //

translated: “The bodhisattva great beings who wish to rest in the samādhi of Avalokiteśvara’s seal should train in the perfection of wisdom.

original: chos kyi dbyings su nges pa'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag par 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o //🔽nges pa'i rgyal mtshan dpal gyi ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag par 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o //

translated: “The bodhisattva great beings who wish to rest in the samādhi of ascertainment of the realm of phenomena should train in the perfection of wisdom.🔽“The bodhisattva great beings who wish to rest in the samādhi of the glorious banner of ascertainment should train in the perfection of wisdom.

original: rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag par 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o //
analyzed: rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag par 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o //
translated: “The bodhisattva great beings who wish to rest in the vajra-like samādhi should train in the perfection of wisdom.”

analyzed: chos thams cad la 'jug pa'i sgo'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam @440b par bzhag par 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o // ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag par 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o //
translated: “A bodhisattva great being who wishes to rest in equipoise in the meditative absorption that is the gateway to all phenomena should train in the perfection of wisdom.🔽A bodhisattva great being who wishes to rest in equipoise in the meditative absorption that is the king of meditative absorptions should train in the perfection of wisdom.

original: rgyal po'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag par 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o //
analyzed: rgyal po'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag par 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o //
translated: A bodhisattva great being who wishes to rest in equipoise in the meditative absorption that is the royal seal should train in the perfection of wisdom.

original: dpung rnam par bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag par 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o //🔽yang dag par 'phags pa'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag par 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o //

translated: “A bodhisattva great being who wishes to rest in the meditative absorption of the arrayed army should train in the perfection of wisdom.🔽A bodhisattva great being who wishes to rest in the meditative absorption of the noble ascent should train in the perfection of wisdom.

translated: A bodhisattva great being who wishes to rest in the meditative absorption of the definitive expression of all phenomena should train in the perfection of wisdom.”

original: chos thams cad shes par gnas pa la 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag par 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab @441a *//🔽par bgyi'o // phyogs bcur rnam par lta ba'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag par 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o //

translated: “The bodhisattva mahāsattva who wishes to rest in the samādhi that is the knowledge of the location of all phenomena should train in the perfection of wisdom.🔽“The bodhisattva mahāsattva who wishes to rest in the samādhi that is the view of the ten directions should train in the perfection of wisdom.

original: gzungs kyi sgo thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag par 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o //

translated: “The bodhisattva mahāsattva who wishes to rest in the samādhi that is the seal of all the dhāraṇī gateways should train in the perfection of wisdom.”

original: chos thams cad nyams pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag par 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o //🔽chos thams cad yang dag par 'du ba'i rang bzhin phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag par 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o //

translated: “The bodhisattva great beings who wish to rest in the meditative absorption of the unimpaired nature of all phenomena should train in the perfection of wisdom.🔽“The bodhisattva great beings who wish to rest in the meditative absorption of the seal that is the nature of the perfect gathering of all phenomena should train in the perfection of wisdom.

original: nam mkha'i gnas la gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag par 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o //

translated: “The bodhisattva great beings who wish to rest in the meditative absorption of abiding in space should train in the perfection of wisdom.

original: 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag par 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o //🔽mngon par shes pa @441b mi nyams pa'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag par 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o //
analyzed: 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag par 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o // mngon par shes pa @441b mi nyams pa'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag par 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o //
translated: The bodhisattva mahāsattva who wishes to rest in equipoise in the samādhi of the complete purity of the three spheres should train in the perfection of wisdom.🔽The bodhisattva mahāsattva who wishes to rest in equipoise in the samādhi of unimpaired superknowledge should train in the perfection of wisdom.

original: snod du gyur pa'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag par 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o //
analyzed: snod du gyur pa'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag par 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o //
translated: The bodhisattva mahāsattva who wishes to rest in equipoise in the samādhi of becoming a vessel should train in the perfection of wisdom.

original: rgyal mtshan rtse mo'i dpung rgyan gyi ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag par 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o //🔽nyon mongs pa thams cad ma lus par sreg pa'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag par 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o; ;bdud bzhi'i dpung sel ba'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par

translated: “A bodhisattva great being who wishes to enter the meditative absorption called ‘banner-top ornament’ should train in the perfection of wisdom.🔽“A bodhisattva great being who wishes to enter the meditative absorption called ‘burning all afflictions without exception’ should train in the perfection of wisdom.

original: bzhag par 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o //

translated: “To rest in equipoise in the meditative absorption of the four formless absorptions, bodhisattva great beings should train in the perfection of wisdom.🔽“

original: 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe nang stong pa nyid la phyi stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /🔽phyi stong pa nyid la nang stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe nang stong pa nyid la phyi stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / phyi stong pa nyid la nang stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: Here, when bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom, they do not see outer emptiness in inner emptiness.🔽They do not see inner emptiness in outer emptiness.

original: phyi stong pa nyid la phyi nang stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /🔽phyi nang stong pa nyid la phyi stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /🔽phyi nang stong pa nyid la stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid la phyi nang stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / phyi nang stong pa nyid la phyi stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / phyi nang stong pa nyid la stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: They do not see outer emptiness in inner and outer emptiness.🔽They do not see inner and outer emptiness in outer emptiness.🔽They do not see emptiness of emptiness in inner and outer emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la phyi nang stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la phyi nang stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: They do not see inner and outer emptiness in emptiness of emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la chen po stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la chen po stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: They do not see emptiness of emptiness in great emptiness.

original: chen po stong pa nyid la stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /🔽chen po stong pa nyid la don dam pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid la stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / chen po stong pa nyid la don dam pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: They do not see the emptiness of great extent in the emptiness of emptiness.🔽They do not see the emptiness of ultimate reality in the emptiness of great extent.

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid la chen po stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /🔽don dam pa stong pa nyid la 'dus byas stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid la chen po stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / don dam pa stong pa nyid la 'dus byas stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: They do not see the emptiness of great extent in the emptiness of ultimate reality.🔽They do not see the emptiness of conditioned phenomena in the emptiness of ultimate reality.

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid la don dam pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /🔽'dus byas stong pa nyid la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /🔽'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la 'dus byas stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid la don dam pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / 'dus byas stong pa nyid la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la 'dus byas stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: They do not see the emptiness of ultimate reality in the emptiness of conditioned phenomena.🔽They do not see the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena in the emptiness of conditioned phenomena.🔽They do not see the emptiness of conditioned phenomena in the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena.

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yang @446b dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yang @446b dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: They do not see the emptiness of the unlimited in the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena.

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: They do not see the emptiness of the conditioned in the emptiness of what is beyond extremes.

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /🔽thog ma dang tham med pa stong pa nyid la mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / thog ma dang tham med pa stong pa nyid la mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: They do not see the emptiness of what is beginningless and endless in the emptiness of what is beyond extremes.🔽They do not see the emptiness of what is beyond extremes in the emptiness of what is beginningless and endless.

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: They do not see the emptiness of what is not to be discarded in the emptiness of what is beginningless and endless.

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la thog ma dang tha ma med ba stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /🔽dor pa med pa stong pa nyid la rang bzhin stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la thog ma dang tha ma med ba stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / dor pa med pa stong pa nyid la rang bzhin stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: They do not see the emptiness of what is beginningless and endless in the emptiness of what is not to be discarded.🔽They do not see the emptiness of nature in the emptiness of what is not to be discarded.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid la dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid la dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: They do not see the emptiness of what is not to be discarded in the emptiness of nature.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid la chos thams cad stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /🔽chos thams cad stong pa nyid la rang bzhin stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid la chos thams cad stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / chos thams cad stong pa nyid la rang bzhin stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: They do not see the emptiness of all phenomena in the emptiness of inherent existence.🔽They do not see the emptiness of inherent existence in the emptiness of all phenomena.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: They do not see the emptiness of defining characteristics in the emptiness of all phenomena.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la chos thams cad stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /🔽rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la chos thams cad stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: They do not see the emptiness of all phenomena in the emptiness of defining characteristics.🔽They do not see the emptiness of nonobservation in the emptiness of defining characteristics.

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: They do not see the emptiness of defining characteristics in the emptiness of nonobservation.

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: They do not see the emptiness of things that are not existent in the emptiness of nonobservation.

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la mi dmigs @447a *//
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la mi dmigs @447a *//
translated: The emptiness of nonthings is not apprehended.🔽

original: pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /🔽dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: They do not see the emptiness of non-apprehension in the emptiness of the non-existence of things.🔽They do not see the emptiness of essential nature in the emptiness of the non-existence of things.

original: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: They do not see the emptiness of the non-existence of things in the emptiness of essential nature.🔽They do not see the emptiness of essential nature in the emptiness of the non-existence of things.

original: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: They do not see the emptiness of the non-existence of essential nature in the emptiness of essential nature.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
translated: They do not see the emptiness of essential nature in the emptiness of the non-existence of essential nature.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod na /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod na /
translated: when bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom in that way,

original: byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par 'jug go /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par 'jug go /
translated: they enter into the maturity of the bodhisattvas.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa 'di ltar bslab par bya ste /
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa 'di ltar bslab par bya ste /
translated: “Moreover, Venerable Śāradvatīputra, when bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom, they should train as follows:

original: slob pa'i tshe ci nas kyang gzugs shes par bya ste /
analyzed: slob pa'i tshe ci nas kyang gzugs shes par bya ste /
translated: When training, they should know form,

original: gzugs des rlom sems su mi bya'o //
analyzed: gzugs des rlom sems su mi bya'o //
translated: but they should not be conceited about that form.

original: tshor ba shes par bya ste /
analyzed: tshor ba shes par bya ste /
translated: They should know feeling,

original: tshor ba des rlom sems su mi bya'o //
analyzed: tshor ba des rlom sems su mi bya'o //
translated: but they should not be conceited about that feeling.

original: 'du shes shes par bya ste /
analyzed: 'du shes shes par bya ste /
translated: They should know perception,

original: 'du shes des rlom sems su mi bya'o //
analyzed: 'du shes des rlom sems su mi bya'o //
translated: but they should not be conceited about that perception.

original: 'du byed shes par bya ste /
analyzed: 'du byed shes par bya ste /
translated: They should know volitional factors,

original: 'du byed des rlom sems su mi bya'o //
analyzed: 'du byed des rlom sems su mi bya'o //
translated: but they should not be conceited about those volitional factors.

original: rnam par shes pa shes par bya ste /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa shes par bya ste /
translated: They should know consciousness,

original: rnam par shes pa des rlom sems su mi bya'o //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa des rlom sems su mi bya'o //
translated: but they should not be conceited about that consciousness.

original: mig shes par bya ste /
analyzed: mig shes par bya ste /
translated: They should know the eyes,

original: mig des rlom sems su mi bya'o //
analyzed: mig des rlom sems su mi bya'o //
translated: but they should not be conceited about those eyes.🔽They should know the ears,

original: rna ba shes par bya @447b ste; rna ba des rlom sems su mi bya'o //
analyzed: rna ba shes par bya @447b ste; rna ba des rlom sems su mi bya'o //
translated: but they should not be conceited about those ears.

original: sna shes par bya ste /
analyzed: sna shes par bya ste /
translated: They should know the nose,

original: sna des rlom sems su mi bya'o //
analyzed: sna des rlom sems su mi bya'o //
translated: but not make the nose into something to be conceited about.

original: lce shes par bya ste /
analyzed: lce shes par bya ste /
translated: One should know the tongue,

original: lce des rlom sems su mi bya'o //
analyzed: lce des rlom sems su mi bya'o //
translated: but not make the tongue into something to be conceited about.

original: lus shes par bya ste /
analyzed: lus shes par bya ste /
translated: One should know the body,

original: lus des rlom sems su mi bya'o //
analyzed: lus des rlom sems su mi bya'o //
translated: but not make the body into something to be conceited about.

original: yid shes par bya ste /
analyzed: yid shes par bya ste /
translated: One should know the mind,

original: yid des rlom sems su mi bya'o //
analyzed: yid des rlom sems su mi bya'o //
translated: but not make the mind into something to be conceited about.

original: gzugs shes par bya ste /
analyzed: gzugs shes par bya ste /
translated: One should know forms,

original: gzugs des rlom sems su mi bya'o //
analyzed: gzugs des rlom sems su mi bya'o //
translated: but not make forms into something to be conceited about.

original: sgra shes par bya ste /
analyzed: sgra shes par bya ste /
translated: One should know sounds,

original: sgra des rlom sems su mi bya'o //
analyzed: sgra des rlom sems su mi bya'o //
translated: but not make sounds into something to be conceited about.

original: dri shes par bya ste /
analyzed: dri shes par bya ste /
translated: One should know smells,

original: dri des rlom sems su mi bya'o //
analyzed: dri des rlom sems su mi bya'o //
translated: but not make smells into something to be conceited about.

original: ro shes par bya ste /
analyzed: ro shes par bya ste /
translated: One should know tastes,

original: ro des rlom sems su mi bya'o //
analyzed: ro des rlom sems su mi bya'o //
translated: but not make tastes into something to be conceited about.

original: reg shes par bya ste /
analyzed: reg shes par bya ste /
translated: One should know touches,

original: reg des rlom sems su mi bya'o //
analyzed: reg des rlom sems su mi bya'o //
translated: but not make touches into something to be conceited about.

original: chos shes par bya ste /
analyzed: chos shes par bya ste /
translated: One should know mental phenomena,

original: chos des rlom sems su mi bya'o //
analyzed: chos des rlom sems su mi bya'o //
translated: but not make mental phenomena into something to be conceited about.

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa shes par bya ste /
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa shes par bya ste /
translated: One should know the eye consciousness,

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa des rlom sems su mi bya'o //
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa des rlom sems su mi bya'o //
translated: but not make the eye consciousness into something to be conceited about.

original: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa shes par bya ste /
analyzed: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa shes par bya ste /
translated: One should know the ear consciousness,

original: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa des rlom sems su mi bya'o //
analyzed: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa des rlom sems su mi bya'o //
translated: but they should not be conceited because of that ear consciousness.

original: sna'i rnam par shes pa shes par bya ste /
analyzed: sna'i rnam par shes pa shes par bya ste /
translated: They should know the nose consciousness,

original: sna'i rnam par shes pa des rlom sems su mi bya'o //
analyzed: sna'i rnam par shes pa des rlom sems su mi bya'o //
translated: but they should not be conceited because of that nose consciousness.

original: lce'i rnam par shes pa shes par bya ste /
analyzed: lce'i rnam par shes pa shes par bya ste /
translated: They should know the tongue consciousness,

original: lce'i rnam par shes pa des rlom sems su mi bya'o //
analyzed: lce'i rnam par shes pa des rlom sems su mi bya'o //
translated: but they should not be conceited because of that tongue consciousness.

original: lus kyi rnam par shes pa shes par bya ste /
analyzed: lus kyi rnam par shes pa shes par bya ste /
translated: They should know the body consciousness,

original: lus kyi rnam par shes pa des rlom sems su mi bya'o //
analyzed: lus kyi rnam par shes pa des rlom sems su mi bya'o //
translated: but they should not be conceited because of that body consciousness.

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa shes par bya ste /
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa shes par bya ste /
translated: They should know the thinking-mind consciousness,

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa des rlom sems su mi bya'o //
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa des rlom sems su mi bya'o //
translated: but they should not be conceited because of that thinking-mind consciousness.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa shes par bya ste /🔽mig gi 'dus te reg pa des @448a *//
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa shes par bya ste / mig gi 'dus te reg pa des @448a *//
translated: They should know eye contact,

original: rlom sems su mi bya'o //
analyzed: rlom sems su mi bya'o //
translated: but they should not be conceited because of that eye contact.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa shes par bya ste /
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa shes par bya ste /
translated: They should know ear contact,

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa des rlom sems su mi bya'o //
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa des rlom sems su mi bya'o //
translated: but they should not be conceited because of that ear contact.

original: sna'i 'dus te reg pa shes par bya ste; sna'i 'dus te reg pa des rlom sems su mi bya'o //
analyzed: sna'i 'dus te reg pa shes par bya ste; sna'i 'dus te reg pa des rlom sems su mi bya'o //
translated: They should know nose contact, but they should not be conceited because of nose contact.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa shes par bya ste /
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa shes par bya ste /
translated: They should know tongue contact,

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa des rlom sems su mi bya'o //
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa des rlom sems su mi bya'o //
translated: but they should not be conceited because of tongue contact.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa shes par bya ste /
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa shes par bya ste /
translated: They should know body contact,

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa des rlom sems su mi bya'o //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa des rlom sems su mi bya'o //
translated: but they should not be conceited because of body contact.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa shes par bya ste /
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa shes par bya ste /
translated: They should know mind contact,

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa des rlom sems su mi bya'o //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa des rlom sems su mi bya'o //
translated: but they should not be conceited because of mind contact.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba shes par bya ste /
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba shes par bya ste /
translated: “They should know the feeling that arises from the condition of eye contact,

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba des rlom sems su mi bya'o //
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba des rlom sems su mi bya'o //
translated: but they should not be conceited because of the feeling that arises from the condition of eye contact.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba shes par bya ste /
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba shes par bya ste /
translated: They should know the feeling that arises from the condition of ear contact,

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba des rlom sems su mi bya'o //
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba des rlom sems su mi bya'o //
translated: but they should not be conceited because of the feeling that arises from the condition of ear contact.

original: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba shes par bya ste /
analyzed: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba shes par bya ste /
translated: They should know the feeling that arises from the condition of nose contact,

original: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba des rlom sems su mi bya'o //
analyzed: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba des rlom sems su mi bya'o //
translated: but they should not become proud because of that feeling that arises from the condition of sensory contact at the nose.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba shes par bya ste /
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba shes par bya ste /
translated: They should understand the feeling that arises from the condition of sensory contact at the tongue,

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba des rlom sems su mi bya'o //
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba des rlom sems su mi bya'o //
translated: but they should not become proud because of that feeling that arises from the condition of sensory contact at the tongue.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba shes par bya ste /
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba shes par bya ste /
translated: They should understand the feeling that arises from the condition of sensory contact at the body,

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba des rlom sems su mi bya'o //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba des rlom sems su mi bya'o //
translated: but they should not become proud because of that feeling that arises from the condition of sensory contact at the body.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba shes par bya ste /
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba shes par bya ste /
translated: They should understand the feeling that arises from the condition of sensory contact at the intellect,

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i @448b rkyen gyis tshor ba des rlom sems su mi bya'o //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i @448b rkyen gyis tshor ba des rlom sems su mi bya'o //
translated: but they should not become proud because of that feeling that arises from the condition of sensory contact at the intellect.

original: sa'i khams shes par bya ste /
analyzed: sa'i khams shes par bya ste /
translated: They should understand the earth element,

original: sa'i khams des rlom sems su mi bya'o //
analyzed: sa'i khams des rlom sems su mi bya'o //

analyzed: snying rje chen po des rlom sems su mi bya'o //
translated: but one should not become proud on account of it.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad shes par bya ste /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad shes par bya ste /
translated: “One should know the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas,

original: sangs @451a *// rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad po de dag gis rlom sems su mi bya'o //
analyzed: sangs @451a *// rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad po de dag gis rlom sems su mi bya'o //
translated: but one should not become proud on account of them.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: The Lord: So it is, Subhuti.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe byang chub kyi sems des rlom sems su mi bya'o //🔽mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sems kyis rlom sems su mi bya'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe byang chub kyi sems des rlom sems su mi bya'o // mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sems kyis rlom sems su mi bya'o //
translated: The Bodhisattva, the great being, who courses in the perfection of wisdom as it has been explained, should not settle down in the thought of enlightenment.🔽He should not settle down in the thought of the unequalled,🔽in the thought of the great compassion,

original: rlabs po che'i sems kyis rlom sems su mi bya'o //
analyzed: rlabs po che'i sems kyis rlom sems su mi bya'o //
translated: in the thought of the great love.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: 'di ltar sems de sems ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di ltar sems de sems ma yin te /
translated: Because that thought is not a thought.

original: sems kyi rang bzhin 'od gsal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sems kyi rang bzhin 'od gsal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: The nature of thought is clear light.🔽Subhuti: What is the clear light nature of thought?🔽Subhuti: The thought which is not joined with nor unjoined with greed,🔽which is not joined with nor unjoined with hatred,🔽which is not joined with nor unjoined with delusion,

original: smras pa / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor; sems kyi rang bzhin 'od gsal ba gang yin /
analyzed: smras pa / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor; sems kyi rang bzhin 'od gsal ba gang yin /
translated: which is not joined with nor unjoined with the defilements,🔽which is not joined with nor unjoined with actions,

original: rab 'byor gyis smras pa /🔽tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis smras pa / tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: which is not joined with nor unjoined with rebirth,

original: sems gang 'dod chags dang yang mi ldan ma bral /
analyzed: sems gang 'dod chags dang yang mi ldan ma bral /
translated: which is not joined with nor unjoined with the world of sense desire,🔽which is not joined with nor unjoined with the world of form,🔽which is not joined with nor unjoined with the formless world,🔽which is not joined with nor unjoined with the fruit of a Streamwinner,🔽which is not joined with nor unjoined with the fruit of a Once-Returner,🔽which is not joined with nor unjoined with the fruit of a Never-Returner,🔽which is not joined with nor unjoined with the fruit of a Arhat,🔽which is not joined with nor unjoined with the fruit of a Pratyekabuddha,

original: gti mug dang yang mi ldan ma bral /
analyzed: gti mug dang yang mi ldan ma bral /
translated: which is not joined with nor unjoined with the knowledge of all modes,🔽which is not joined with nor unjoined with the cognition of the knowledge of all modes,

original: zhe sdang dang yang mi ldan ma bral /
analyzed: zhe sdang dang yang mi ldan ma bral /
translated: which is not joined with nor unjoined with the cognition of the knowledge of the paths,🔽which is not joined with nor unjoined with the cognition of the knowledge of the awareness of all things,🔽which is not joined with nor unjoined with the cognition of the knowledge of the awareness of all modes,🔽which is not joined with nor unjoined with the cognition of the knowledge of the awareness of all beings,🔽which is not joined with nor unjoined with the cognition of the knowledge of the awareness of all worlds,🔽which is not joined with nor unjoined with the cognition of the knowledge of the awareness of all space,🔽which is not joined with nor unjoined with the cognition of the knowledge of the awareness of

original: kun nas ldang ba dang yang mi ldan ma bral /🔽sgrib pa dang yang mi ldan ma bral /
analyzed: kun nas ldang ba dang yang mi ldan ma bral / sgrib pa dang yang mi ldan ma bral /
translated: They are neither conjoined with nor disjoined from the mental afflictions.🔽They are neither conjoined with nor disjoined from the obscurations.

original: gcod pa dang yang mi ldan ma bral /🔽bag la nyal ba dang yang mi ldan ma bral /
analyzed: gcod pa dang yang mi ldan ma bral / bag la nyal ba dang yang mi ldan ma bral /
translated: They are neither conjoined with nor disjoined from the severance.🔽They are neither conjoined with nor disjoined from latent tendencies.

original: kun tu sbyor ba dang yang mi ldan ma bral /
analyzed: kun tu sbyor ba dang yang mi ldan ma bral /
translated: They are neither conjoined with nor disjoined from fetters.

original: lta ba'i rnam pa dang yang mi ldan ma bral /🔽nyan thos dang yang mi ldan ma bral /
analyzed: lta ba'i rnam pa dang yang mi ldan ma bral / nyan thos dang yang mi ldan ma bral /
translated: They are neither conjoined with nor disjoined from the aspects of views.🔽They are neither conjoined with nor disjoined from the śrāvakas.🔽They are neither conjoined with nor disjoined from the pratyekabuddhas.

original: rang sangs rgyas dang yang mi ldan ma bral ba 'di ni; tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas dang yang mi ldan ma bral ba 'di ni; tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems kyi rang bzhin 'od gsal ba'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems kyi rang bzhin 'od gsal ba'o //
translated: this is the luminous nature of the mind of bodhisattva great beings.🔽Śāradvatīputra then asked,

original: smras pa / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
analyzed: smras pa / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
translated: “Venerable Subhūti,

original: @451b sems gang la sems ma yin no zhes bya ba de yod dam /
analyzed: @451b sems gang la sems ma yin no zhes bya ba de yod dam /
translated: is there a mind that is not a mind?”

original: rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
translated: Subhūti replied,

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: “Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: de ltar sems ma yin na /
analyzed: de ltar sems ma yin na /
translated: if there is no mind,

original: sems ma yin pa de la yod pa'am med pa dmigs pa'am yod par 'gyur ram /
analyzed: sems ma yin pa de la yod pa'am med pa dmigs pa'am yod par 'gyur ram /
translated: Is that which is not the mind existent or nonexistent, or is it something that can be observed or found?”

original: smras pa / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
analyzed: smras pa / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
translated: Śāriputra replied, “Venerable Subhūti,

original: de lta ma yin no //
analyzed: de lta ma yin no //
translated: it is not like that.”

original: rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
translated: Subhūti said,

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: “Venerable Śāriputra,

original: gal te de ltar sems ma yin pa de la yod pa'am med pa zhes bya ba med cing mi dmigs na /
analyzed: gal te de ltar sems ma yin pa de la yod pa'am med pa zhes bya ba med cing mi dmigs na /
translated: if that which is not the mind is not existent or nonexistent, and is not something that can be observed or found,

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra,

original: khyod kyis de skad du sems gang la sems ma yin pa zhes bya ba de yod dam zhes phyir dris pa de 'thad par 'gyur ram /
analyzed: khyod kyis de skad du sems gang la sems ma yin pa zhes bya ba de yod dam zhes phyir dris pa de 'thad par 'gyur ram /
translated: is it tenable to ask, ‘Is that which is not the mind existent or nonexistent in the mind?’”

original: smras pa / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
analyzed: smras pa / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
translated: Śāriputra replied, “Venerable Subhūti,

original: sems ma yin pa gang yin /
analyzed: sems ma yin pa gang yin /
translated: what is not the mind?”

original: rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
translated: Subhūti said,

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: “Venerable Śāriputra,

original: sems ma yin pa ni /
analyzed: sems ma yin pa ni /
translated: that which is not the mind

original: 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa ste /
analyzed: 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa ste /
translated: is unchanging and nonconceptual.

original: de ni / chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid de /
analyzed: de ni / chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid de /
translated: It is the suchness of all phenomena.

original: de la ni /
analyzed: de la ni /
translated: In it

original: sems med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: sems med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya'o //
translated: It is called “the inconceivable that is not mind.”

original: smras pa / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
analyzed: smras pa / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
translated: Subhūti said, “Venerable Śāriputra,

original: ji ltar sems la 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa de bzhin du gzugs la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
analyzed: ji ltar sems la 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa de bzhin du gzugs la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
translated: just as the mind is without change and without conceptualization, is form also without change and without conceptualization?

original: de bzhin du tshor ba la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
analyzed: de bzhin du tshor ba la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
translated: Is feeling also without change and without conceptualization?

original: de bzhin du 'du shes la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /🔽de bzhin du 'du byed la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa @452a *//
analyzed: de bzhin du 'du shes la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam / de bzhin du 'du byed la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa @452a *//
translated: Is perception also without change and without conceptualization?

original: med pa yin nam /
analyzed: med pa yin nam /
translated: Are formative predispositions also without change and without conceptualization?

original: de bzhin du rnam par shes pa la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
analyzed: de bzhin du rnam par shes pa la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
