original: ji ltar sems la 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa de bzhin du /
analyzed: ji ltar sems la 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa de bzhin du /
translated: Just as the mind is without change and without conceptualization,

original: mig la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
analyzed: mig la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
translated: are the eyes also without change and without conceptualization?

original: de bzhin du rna ba la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /🔽de bzhin du sna la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
analyzed: de bzhin du rna ba la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam / de bzhin du sna la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
translated: Is the ear also unchanging and nonconceptual?🔽Is the nose also unchanging and nonconceptual?

original: de bzhin du lce la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
analyzed: de bzhin du lce la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
translated: Is the tongue also unchanging and nonconceptual?

original: de bzhin du lus la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
analyzed: de bzhin du lus la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
translated: Is the body also unchanging and nonconceptual?

original: de bzhin du yid la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
analyzed: de bzhin du yid la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
translated: Is the mind also unchanging and nonconceptual?

original: ji ltar sems la 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog ba med pa de bzhin du gzugs la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
analyzed: ji ltar sems la 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog ba med pa de bzhin du gzugs la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
translated: Just as the mind is unchanging and nonconceptual, is form also unchanging and nonconceptual?

original: de bzhin du sgra la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
analyzed: de bzhin du sgra la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
translated: Is sound also unchanging and nonconceptual?

original: de bzhin du dri la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
analyzed: de bzhin du dri la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
translated: Is smell also unchanging and nonconceptual?

original: de bzhin du ro la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
analyzed: de bzhin du ro la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
translated: Is taste also unchanging and nonconceptual?

original: de bzhin du reg la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
analyzed: de bzhin du reg la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
translated: Is touch also unchanging and nonconceptual?

original: de bzhin du chos la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
analyzed: de bzhin du chos la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
translated: Are phenomena also unchanging and nonconceptual?

original: ji ltar sems la 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa de @452b bzhin du mig gi khams la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
analyzed: ji ltar sems la 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa de @452b bzhin du mig gi khams la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
translated: Just as the mind is unchanging and nonconceptual, is the eye element also unchanging and nonconceptual?

original: de bzhin du gzugs kyi khams la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
analyzed: de bzhin du gzugs kyi khams la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
translated: Is the form element also unchanging and nonconceptual?

original: de bzhin du mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
analyzed: de bzhin du mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
translated: Is the eye consciousness element also unchanging and nonconceptual?

original: de bzhin du rna ba'i khams la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
analyzed: de bzhin du rna ba'i khams la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
translated: Is the ear element also unchanging and nonconceptual?

original: de bzhin du sgra'i khams la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
analyzed: de bzhin du sgra'i khams la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
translated: Likewise, is the element of sound also unchanging and non-conceptual?

original: de bzhin du rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /🔽de bzhin du sna'i khams la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
analyzed: de bzhin du rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam / de bzhin du sna'i khams la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
translated: Likewise, is the element of auditory consciousness also unchanging and non-conceptual?🔽Likewise, is the element of smell also unchanging and non-conceptual?

original: de bzhin du dri'i khams la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /🔽de bzhin du sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
analyzed: de bzhin du dri'i khams la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam / de bzhin du sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
translated: Likewise, is the element of odor also unchanging and non-conceptual?🔽Likewise, is the element of olfactory consciousness also unchanging and non-conceptual?

original: de bzhin du lce'i khams la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
analyzed: de bzhin du lce'i khams la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
translated: Likewise, is the element of taste also unchanging and non-conceptual?

original: de bzhin du ro'i khams la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
analyzed: de bzhin du ro'i khams la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
translated: Likewise, is the element of taste also unchanging and non-conceptual?

original: de bzhin du lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
analyzed: de bzhin du lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
translated: Likewise, is the element of the tongue consciousness also unchanging and non-conceptual?

original: de bzhin du lus kyi khams la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
analyzed: de bzhin du lus kyi khams la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
translated: Likewise, is the element of the body also unchanging and non-conceptual?

original: de bzhin du reg bya'i khams la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /🔽de bzhin du lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i @453a *//
analyzed: de bzhin du reg bya'i khams la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam / de bzhin du lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i @453a *//
translated: Likewise, is the element of tangibles also unchanging and non-conceptual?

original: khams la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
analyzed: khams la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
translated: Likewise, is the element of the body consciousness also unchanging and non-conceptual?

original: de bzhin du yid kyi khams la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /🔽de bzhin du chos kyi khams la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
analyzed: de bzhin du yid kyi khams la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam / de bzhin du chos kyi khams la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
translated: Likewise, is the element of mind also unchanging and non-conceptual?🔽Likewise, is the element of mental objects also unchanging and non-conceptual?

original: de bzhin du yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
analyzed: de bzhin du yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
translated: Likewise, is the element of mental consciousness also unchanging and non-conceptual?

original: ji ltar sems la 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa de bzhin du sa'i khams la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /🔽de bzhin du chu'i khams la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /🔽de bzhin du me'i khams la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
analyzed: ji ltar sems la 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa de bzhin du sa'i khams la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam / de bzhin du chu'i khams la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam / de bzhin du me'i khams la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
translated: Are the space element and consciousness element also without change and without conceptualization, just as the mind is without change and without conceptualization?

original: de bzhin du rlung gi khams la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /🔽de bzhin du nam mkha'i khams la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
analyzed: de bzhin du rlung gi khams la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam / de bzhin du nam mkha'i khams la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
translated: Are the earth element, water element, fire element, and wind element also without change and without conceptualization, just as the mind is without change and without conceptualization?

original: de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i khams la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
analyzed: de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i khams la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
translated: Are the space element and consciousness element also without change and without conceptualization, just as the mind is without change and without conceptualization?

original: ji ltar sems la 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa de bzhin du ma rig pa la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
analyzed: ji ltar sems la 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa de bzhin du ma rig pa la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
translated: Is ignorance also unchanging and nonconceptual, just as the mind is?

original: de bzhin du 'du byed la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
analyzed: de bzhin du 'du byed la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
translated: Are formations also unchanging and nonconceptual?

original: de bzhin du rnam par shes pa la'ang 'gyur ba med cing @453b rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
analyzed: de bzhin du rnam par shes pa la'ang 'gyur ba med cing @453b rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
translated: Is consciousness also unchanging and nonconceptual?

original: de bzhin du ming dang gzugs la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
analyzed: de bzhin du ming dang gzugs la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
translated: Are name and form also unchanging and nonconceptual?

original: de bzhin du skye mched drug la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
analyzed: de bzhin du skye mched drug la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
translated: Are the six sense sources also unchanging and nonconceptual?

original: de bzhin du reg pa la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
analyzed: de bzhin du reg pa la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
translated: Is contact also unchanging and nonconceptual?

original: de bzhin du tshor ba la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
analyzed: de bzhin du tshor ba la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
translated: Is sensation also unchanging and nonconceptual?

original: de bzhin du sred pa la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
analyzed: de bzhin du sred pa la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
translated: “Is craving also unchanging and nonconceptual?

original: de bzhin du len pa la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
analyzed: de bzhin du len pa la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
translated: “Is grasping also unchanging and nonconceptual?

original: de bzhin du srid pa la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
analyzed: de bzhin du srid pa la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
translated: “Is becoming also unchanging and nonconceptual?

original: de bzhin du skye ba la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
analyzed: de bzhin du skye ba la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
translated: “Is birth also unchanging and nonconceptual?

original: de bzhin du rga shi la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
analyzed: de bzhin du rga shi la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
translated: “Is aging and death also unchanging and nonconceptual?

original: ji ltar sems la 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa de bzhin du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
analyzed: ji ltar sems la 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa de bzhin du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
translated: “Just as the mind is unchanging and nonconceptual, is the perfection of generosity also unchanging and nonconceptual?

original: de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
analyzed: de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
translated: “Is the perfection of discipline also unchanging and nonconceptual?

original: de bzhin du bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
analyzed: de bzhin du bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
translated: Similarly, is the perfection of patience also unchanging and nonconceptual?

original: de bzhin du brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /🔽de bzhin du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la'ang 'gyur ba med @454a *//
analyzed: de bzhin du brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam / de bzhin du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la'ang 'gyur ba med @454a *//
translated: Similarly, is the perfection of diligence also unchanging and nonconceptual?

original: cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
analyzed: cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
translated: Similarly, is the perfection of concentration also unchanging and nonconceptual?

original: de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
analyzed: de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
translated: Similarly, is the perfection of wisdom also unchanging and nonconceptual?

original: ji ltar sems la 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa de bzhin du nang stong pa nyid la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
analyzed: ji ltar sems la 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa de bzhin du nang stong pa nyid la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
translated: Just as the mind is unchanging and nonconceptual, is inner emptiness also unchanging and nonconceptual?

original: de bzhin du phyi stong pa nyid la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
analyzed: de bzhin du phyi stong pa nyid la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
translated: Similarly, is outer emptiness also unchanging and nonconceptual?

original: de bzhin du phyi nang stong pa nyid la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
analyzed: de bzhin du phyi nang stong pa nyid la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
translated: Similarly, is there no change and no conceptualization in the emptiness of the external and the emptiness of the external and the emptiness of the external and the internal?

original: de bzhin du stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
analyzed: de bzhin du stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
translated: Similarly, is there no change and no conceptualization in the emptiness of emptiness?

original: de bzhin du chen po stong nyid la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
analyzed: de bzhin du chen po stong nyid la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
translated: Similarly, is there no change and no conceptualization in the emptiness of great extent?

original: de bzhin du don dam pa stong pa nyid la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /🔽de bzhin du 'dus byas stong pa nyid la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
analyzed: de bzhin du don dam pa stong pa nyid la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam / de bzhin du 'dus byas stong pa nyid la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
translated: Similarly, is there no change and no conceptualization in the emptiness of ultimate reality?🔽Similarly, is there no change and no conceptualization in the emptiness of conditioned phenomena?

original: de bzhin du 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
analyzed: de bzhin du 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
translated: Similarly, is there no change and no conceptualization in the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena?

original: de bzhin du mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
analyzed: de bzhin du mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
translated: Similarly, is there no change and no conceptualization in the emptiness of what is beyond extremes?

original: de bzhin du thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
analyzed: de bzhin du thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
translated: So too, is the emptiness that is the nonexistence of beginning and end unchanging and nonconceptual?

original: de bzhin du dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
analyzed: de bzhin du dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
translated: Similarly, is the emptiness that is neither unmoving nor varied with respect to the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature?

original: de bzhin @454b du rang bzhin stong pa nyid la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /🔽de bzhin du chos thams cad stong pa nyid la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam; de bzhin du rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
analyzed: de bzhin @454b du rang bzhin stong pa nyid la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam / de bzhin du chos thams cad stong pa nyid la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam; de bzhin du rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
translated: Similarly, is the emptiness that is neither unmoving nor varied with respect to the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature?🔽Similarly, is the emptiness that is neither unmoving nor varied with respect to the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature?

original: de bzhin du mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
analyzed: de bzhin du mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
translated: Similarly, is the emptiness that is neither unmoving nor varied with respect to the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature?🔽Similarly, is the emptiness that is neither unmoving nor varied with respect to the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature?🔽Similarly, is the emptiness that is neither unmoving nor varied with respect to the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature?🔽Similarly, is the emptiness that is neither unmoving nor varied with respect to the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature?🔽Similarly, is the emptiness that is neither unmoving nor varied with respect to the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature?🔽Similarly, is the emptiness that is neither unmoving nor varied with respect to the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature?🔽Similarly, is the emptiness that is neither unmoving nor varied with respect to the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature?🔽Similarly, is the emptiness that is neither unmoving nor varied with respect to the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature?🔽Similarly, is the emptiness that is neither unmoving nor varied with respect to the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature?

original: de bzhin du dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /🔽de bzhin du ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
analyzed: de bzhin du dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam / de bzhin du ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
translated: Similarly, is the emptiness of non-things also unchanging and non-conceptual?🔽Similarly, is the emptiness of essential nature also unchanging and non-conceptual?

original: de bzhin du dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
analyzed: de bzhin du dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
translated: Similarly, is the emptiness of the essential nature of non-things also unchanging and non-conceptual?

original: ji ltar sems la 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa de bzhin du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
analyzed: ji ltar sems la 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa de bzhin du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
translated: Just as the mind is unchanging and non-conceptual, are the applications of mindfulness also unchanging and non-conceptual?

original: de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba rnams la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
analyzed: de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba rnams la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
translated: Similarly, are the right efforts also unchanging and non-conceptual?

original: de bzhin du rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
analyzed: de bzhin du rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
translated: Similarly, are the bases of supernatural power also unchanging and non-conceptual?

original: de bzhin du dbang po rnams la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
analyzed: de bzhin du dbang po rnams la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
translated: Similarly, are the faculties also unchanging and nonconceptual?

original: de bzhin du stobs rnams la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /🔽de bzhin du byang chub kyi yan @455a *//
analyzed: de bzhin du stobs rnams la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam / de bzhin du byang chub kyi yan @455a *//
translated: Similarly, are the powers also unchanging and nonconceptual?

original: lag rnams la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
analyzed: lag rnams la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
translated: Similarly, are the branches of awakening also unchanging and nonconceptual?

original: de bzhin du 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
analyzed: de bzhin du 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
translated: Similarly, is the noble eightfold path also unchanging and nonconceptual?

original: de bzhin du 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
analyzed: de bzhin du 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
translated: Similarly, are the noble truths also unchanging and nonconceptual?

original: de bzhin du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
analyzed: de bzhin du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
translated: Similarly, are the perfections of concentration also unchanging and nonconceptual?

original: de bzhin du tshad med pa rnams la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
analyzed: de bzhin du tshad med pa rnams la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
translated: Similarly, are the immeasurables also unchanging and nonconceptual?

original: de bzhin du gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
analyzed: de bzhin du gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
translated: Are the formless absorptions also unchanging and nonconceptual?🔽Are the eight aspects of liberation also unchanging and nonconceptual?

original: de bzhin du rnam par thar pa brgyad la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam; de bzhin du mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
analyzed: de bzhin du rnam par thar pa brgyad la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam; de bzhin du mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
translated: Are the nine serial steps of meditative absorption also unchanging and nonconceptual?

original: de bzhin du rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
analyzed: de bzhin du rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
translated: Are the three gateways to liberation—namely, emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness—unchanging and nonconceptual?

original: de bzhin du mngon par shes pa rnams la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
analyzed: de bzhin du mngon par shes pa rnams la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
translated: Are the supernormal powers also unchanging and nonconceptual?

original: de bzhin du ting nge 'dzin rnams la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
analyzed: de bzhin du ting nge 'dzin rnams la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
translated: Are the meditative stabilities also unchanging and nonconceptual?

original: de bzhin du gzungs kyi sgo rnams la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa @455b med pa yin nam /🔽de bzhin du byams pa chen po la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
analyzed: de bzhin du gzungs kyi sgo rnams la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa @455b med pa yin nam / de bzhin du byams pa chen po la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
translated: Are the dhāraṇī gateways also unchanging and nonconceptual?🔽Is great love also unchanging and nonconceptual?

original: de bzhin du snying rje chen po la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
analyzed: de bzhin du snying rje chen po la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
translated: Is great compassion also unchanging and nonconceptual?

original: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
analyzed: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
translated: Are the ten powers of the tathāgatas also unchanging and nonconceptual?

original: de bzhin du mi 'jigs pa bzhi la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
analyzed: de bzhin du mi 'jigs pa bzhi la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
translated: Are the four fearlessnesses also unchanging and nonconceptual?

original: de bzhin du so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
analyzed: de bzhin du so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
translated: Are the four detailed and thorough knowledges also unchanging and nonconceptual?

original: de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
analyzed: de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
translated: Are the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha also unchanging and nonconceptual?

original: ji ltar sems la 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa de bzhin du rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
analyzed: ji ltar sems la 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa de bzhin du rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
translated: “Just as the mind is unchanging and nonconceptual, is the result of stream enterer also unchanging and nonconceptual?

original: de bzhin du lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
analyzed: de bzhin du lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
translated: Similarly, is the result of once-returner also unchanging and nonconceptual?

original: de bzhin du phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
analyzed: de bzhin du phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
translated: Similarly, is the result of non-returner also unchanging and nonconceptual?

original: de bzhin du dgra bcom pa nyid la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
analyzed: de bzhin du dgra bcom pa nyid la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
translated: Similarly, is the state of a worthy one also unchanging and nonconceptual?

original: de bzhin du rang byang chub la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
analyzed: de bzhin du rang byang chub la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
translated: Similarly, is a pratyekabuddha’s awakening also unchanging and nonconceptual?

original: de bzhin du lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /🔽de bzhin du rnam pa @456a *//
analyzed: de bzhin du lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /🔽de bzhin du rnam pa @456a *//
translated: Similarly, is the knowledge of path aspects also unchanging and nonconceptual?🔽Similarly, is the knowledge of all aspects also unchanging and nonconceptual?

original: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
translated: Is omniscience also unchanging and nonconceptual?

original: rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
translated: Subhūti replied,

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: “Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: de de bzhin te /
analyzed: de de bzhin te /
translated: it is so.

original: ji ltar sems la 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa de bzhin du /
analyzed: ji ltar sems la 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa de bzhin du /
translated: Just as the mind is unchanging and nonconceptual,

original: gzugs la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
analyzed: gzugs la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
translated: form is also unchanging and nonconceptual.

original: de bzhin du tshor ba la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
analyzed: de bzhin du tshor ba la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
translated: Likewise, feeling is also unchanging and nonconceptual.

original: de bzhin du 'du shes la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
analyzed: de bzhin du 'du shes la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
translated: Likewise, perception is also unchanging and nonconceptual.

original: de bzhin du 'du byed la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
analyzed: de bzhin du 'du byed la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
translated: Likewise, volitional factors are also unchanging and nonconceptual.

original: de bzhin du rnam par shes pa la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
analyzed: de bzhin du rnam par shes pa la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
translated: Likewise, consciousness is also unchanging and nonconceptual.

original: ji ltar sems la 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa de bzhin du /
analyzed: ji ltar sems la 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa de bzhin du /
translated: Just as the mind is unchanging and nonconceptual,

original: mig la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
analyzed: mig la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
translated: The eye is also without change and without conceptualization.

original: de bzhin du rna ba la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //🔽de bzhin du sna la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
analyzed: de bzhin du rna ba la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do // de bzhin du sna la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
translated: Similarly, the ear is also without change and without conceptualization.🔽Similarly, the nose is also without change and without conceptualization.

original: de bzhin du lce la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
analyzed: de bzhin du lce la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
translated: Similarly, the tongue is also without change and without conceptualization.

original: de bzhin du lus la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
analyzed: de bzhin du lus la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
translated: Similarly, the body is also without change and without conceptualization.

original: de bzhin du yid la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
analyzed: de bzhin du yid la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
translated: Similarly, the mind is also without change and without conceptualization.

original: ji ltar sems la 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa de bzhin du gzugs la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
analyzed: ji ltar sems la 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa de bzhin du gzugs la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
translated: Just as the mind is without change and without conceptualization, so too form is also without change and without conceptualization.

original: de bzhin du sgra la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
analyzed: de bzhin du sgra la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
translated: Similarly, sound is also without change and without conceptualization.

original: @456b de bzhin du dri la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
analyzed: @456b de bzhin du dri la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //

analyzed: de bzhin du ro la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //

original: de bzhin du reg la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
analyzed: de bzhin du reg la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
translated: In the same way, touch is unchanging and nonconceptual.

original: de bzhin du chos la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
analyzed: de bzhin du chos la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
translated: In the same way, mental phenomena are unchanging and nonconceptual.

analyzed: ji ltar sems la 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa de bzhin du mig gi khams la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //

analyzed: de bzhin du mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do // de bzhin du rna ba'i khams la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
translated: In the same way, the eye consciousness element is unchanging and nonconceptual.🔽In the same way, the ear element is unchanging and nonconceptual.

original: de bzhin du sgra'i khams la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
analyzed: de bzhin du sgra'i khams la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //

original: de bzhin du rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
analyzed: de bzhin du rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //

original: de bzhin du sna'i khams la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
analyzed: de bzhin du sna'i khams la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
translated: In the same way, the element of smell is unchanging and non-conceptual.

original: de bzhin du dri'i khams la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //🔽de bzhin du sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
analyzed: de bzhin du dri'i khams la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do // de bzhin du sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
translated: In the same way, the element of smell is unchanging and non-conceptual.🔽In the same way, the element of olfactory consciousness is unchanging and non-conceptual.

original: de bzhin du lce'i khams la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //🔽de bzhin du ro'i khams la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
analyzed: de bzhin du lce'i khams la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do // de bzhin du ro'i khams la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
translated: In the same way, the element of taste is unchanging and non-conceptual.🔽In the same way, the element of taste is unchanging and non-conceptual.

analyzed: de bzhin du lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam @457a *// par rtog pa med do //

analyzed: de bzhin du lus kyi khams la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
translated: In the same way, the element of touch is unchanging and non-conceptual.🔽In the same way, the element of touch is unchanging and non-conceptual.

analyzed: de bzhin du reg bya'i khams la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
translated: Likewise, the element of touch is unchanging and nonconceptual.

original: de bzhin du lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
analyzed: de bzhin du lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
translated: Likewise, the element of body consciousness is unchanging and nonconceptual.

original: de bzhin du yid kyi khams la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //🔽de bzhin du chos kyi khams la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
analyzed: de bzhin du yid kyi khams la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do // de bzhin du chos kyi khams la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
translated: Likewise, the element of mind is unchanging and nonconceptual.🔽Likewise, the element of mental objects is unchanging and nonconceptual.

original: de bzhin du yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
analyzed: de bzhin du yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
translated: Likewise, the element of mental consciousness is unchanging and nonconceptual.

original: ji ltar sems la 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa de bzhin du sa'i khams la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
analyzed: ji ltar sems la 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa de bzhin du sa'i khams la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
translated: Just as the mind is unchanging and nonconceptual, likewise, the earth element is unchanging and nonconceptual.

original: de bzhin du chu'i khams la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
analyzed: de bzhin du chu'i khams la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
translated: Likewise, the water element is unchanging and nonconceptual.

original: de bzhin du me'i khams la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
analyzed: de bzhin du me'i khams la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
translated: Likewise, the fire element has no fluctuation and no conceptualization.

original: de bzhin du rlung gi khams la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
analyzed: de bzhin du rlung gi khams la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
translated: Likewise, the wind element has no fluctuation and no conceptualization.

original: de bzhin du nam mkha'i khams la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
analyzed: de bzhin du nam mkha'i khams la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
translated: Likewise, the space element has no fluctuation and no conceptualization.

original: de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i khams la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
analyzed: de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i khams la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
translated: Likewise, the consciousness element has no fluctuation and no conceptualization.

original: ji ltar sems la 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa de bzhin du ma rig pa la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
analyzed: ji ltar sems la 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa de bzhin du ma rig pa la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
translated: Just as the mind has no fluctuation and no conceptualization, likewise ignorance has no fluctuation and no conceptualization.

original: de bzhin du @457b 'du byed la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
analyzed: de bzhin du @457b 'du byed la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
translated: Likewise, formations have no fluctuation and no conceptualization.

original: de bzhin du rnam par shes pa la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
analyzed: de bzhin du rnam par shes pa la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
translated: Likewise, consciousness has no fluctuation and no conceptualization.

original: de bzhin du ming dang gzugs la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
analyzed: de bzhin du ming dang gzugs la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
translated: Likewise, name and form have no fluctuation and no conceptualization.

original: de bzhin du skye mched drug la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
analyzed: de bzhin du skye mched drug la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
translated: Likewise, the six sense sources are unchanging and nonconceptual.

original: de bzhin du reg pa la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
analyzed: de bzhin du reg pa la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
translated: Likewise, contact is unchanging and nonconceptual.

original: de bzhin du tshor ba la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
analyzed: de bzhin du tshor ba la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
translated: Likewise, feeling is unchanging and nonconceptual.

original: de bzhin du sred pa la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
analyzed: de bzhin du sred pa la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
translated: Likewise, craving is unchanging and nonconceptual.

original: de bzhin du len pa la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //🔽de bzhin du srid pa la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
analyzed: de bzhin du len pa la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do // de bzhin du srid pa la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
translated: Likewise, grasping is unchanging and nonconceptual.🔽Likewise, becoming is unchanging and nonconceptual.

original: de bzhin du skye ba la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
analyzed: de bzhin du skye ba la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
translated: Likewise, birth is unchanging and nonconceptual.

original: de bzhin du rga shi la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
analyzed: de bzhin du rga shi la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
translated: Likewise, aging and death are unchanging and nonconceptual.

original: ji ltar sems la 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa de bzhin du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
analyzed: ji ltar sems la 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa de bzhin du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
translated: Just as the mind is without change and without conceptualization, so too the perfection of generosity is without change and without conceptualization.

original: de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //🔽de bzhin du bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
analyzed: de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do // de bzhin du bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
translated: Similarly, the perfection of moral discipline is without change and without conceptualization.🔽Similarly, the perfection of patient acceptance is without change and without conceptualization.

original: de bzhin du brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
analyzed: de bzhin du brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
translated: Similarly, the perfection of perseverance is without change and without conceptualization.

original: de bzhin du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
analyzed: de bzhin du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
translated: Similarly, the perfection of meditative stability is without change and without conceptualization.

original: de bzhin @458a *//
analyzed: de bzhin @458a *//
translated: Similarly,

original: du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
analyzed: du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
translated: the perfection of wisdom is without change and without conceptualization.

original: ji ltar sems la 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa de bzhin du nang stong pa nyid la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //🔽de bzhin du phyi stong pa nyid la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
analyzed: ji ltar sems la 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa de bzhin du nang stong pa nyid la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do // de bzhin du phyi stong pa nyid la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
translated: Just as the mind is without change and without conceptualization, so too inner emptiness is without change and without conceptualization.🔽Just as the mind is without change and without conceptualization, so too outer emptiness is without change and without conceptualization.

original: de bzhin du phyi nang stong pa nyid la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
analyzed: de bzhin du phyi nang stong pa nyid la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
translated: Just as the mind is without change and without conceptualization, so too inner and outer emptiness is without change and without conceptualization.

original: de bzhin du stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
analyzed: de bzhin du stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
translated: Just as the mind is without change and without conceptualization, so too the emptiness of emptiness is without change and without conceptualization.

original: de bzhin du chen po stong pa nyid la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
analyzed: de bzhin du chen po stong pa nyid la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
translated: Just as the mind is without change and without conceptualization, so too great emptiness is without change and without conceptualization.

original: de bzhin du don dam pa stong pa nyid la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
analyzed: de bzhin du don dam pa stong pa nyid la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
translated: Just as the mind is without change and without conceptualization, so too ultimate emptiness is without change and without conceptualization.

original: de bzhin du 'dus byas stong pa nyid la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
analyzed: de bzhin du 'dus byas stong pa nyid la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
translated: Just as the mind is without change and without conceptualization, so too conditioned emptiness is without change and without conceptualization.

original: de bzhin du 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //🔽de bzhin du mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
analyzed: de bzhin du 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do // de bzhin du mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
translated: Similarly, the emptiness of the unconditioned is also unchanging and non-conceptual.🔽Similarly, the emptiness of what is beyond extremes is also unchanging and non-conceptual.

original: de bzhin du thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
analyzed: de bzhin du thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
translated: Similarly, the emptiness of what is beginningless and endless is also unchanging and non-conceptual.

original: de bzhin du dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
analyzed: de bzhin du dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
translated: Similarly, the emptiness of what is not to be discarded is also unchanging and non-conceptual.

original: de bzhin du rang bzhin stong pa nyid la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
analyzed: de bzhin du rang bzhin stong pa nyid la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
translated: Similarly, the emptiness of nature is also unchanging and non-conceptual.

original: de bzhin du chos thams cad stong pa nyid la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog @458b pa med do //
analyzed: de bzhin du chos thams cad stong pa nyid la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog @458b pa med do //
translated: Similarly, the emptiness of all phenomena is also unchanging and non-conceptual.

original: de bzhin du rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
analyzed: de bzhin du rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
translated: Similarly, the emptiness of defining characteristics is also unchanging and non-conceptual.

original: de bzhin du mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
analyzed: de bzhin du mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
translated: In the same way, there is no change and no conceptualization in the emptiness of non-apprehension.

original: de bzhin du dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
analyzed: de bzhin du dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
translated: In the same way, there is no change and no conceptualization in the emptiness of non-existence.

original: de bzhin du ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
analyzed: de bzhin du ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
translated: In the same way, there is no change and no conceptualization in the emptiness of own-marks.

original: de bzhin du dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
analyzed: de bzhin du dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
translated: In the same way, there is no change and no conceptualization in the emptiness of the non-existence of own-being.

original: ji ltar sems la 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa de bzhin du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
analyzed: ji ltar sems la 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa de bzhin du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
translated: Just as there is no change and no conceptualization in the mind, so there is no change and no conceptualization in the applications of mindfulness.

original: de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba rnams la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
analyzed: de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba rnams la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
translated: In the same way, there is no change and no conceptualization in the right efforts.

original: de bzhin du rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //🔽de bzhin du dbang po rnams la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
analyzed: de bzhin du rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do // de bzhin du dbang po rnams la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
translated: In the same way, there is no change and no conceptualization in the bases of supernatural powers.🔽In the same way, there is no change and no conceptualization in the powers.

original: de bzhin du stobs rnams la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
analyzed: de bzhin du stobs rnams la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
translated: In the same way, there is no change and no conceptualization in the forces.

original: de bzhin du byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
analyzed: de bzhin du byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
translated: In the same way, there is no change and no conceptualization in the branches of enlightenment.

original: de bzhin du 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
analyzed: de bzhin du 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
translated: In the same way, there is no change and no conceptualization in the noble eightfold path.

original: de bzhin du 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //🔽de bzhin du bsam gtan rnams la'ang @459a *//
analyzed: de bzhin du 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do // de bzhin du bsam gtan rnams la'ang @459a *//
translated: In the same way, there is no change and no conceptualization in the four noble truths.

original: 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
analyzed: 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
translated: In the same way, there is no change and no conceptualization in the meditative stabilizations.

original: de bzhin du tshad med pa rnams la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
analyzed: de bzhin du tshad med pa rnams la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
translated: In the same way, there is no change and no conceptualization in the boundless states.🔽In the same way, there is no change and no conceptualization in the formless absorptions.

original: de bzhin du gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
analyzed: de bzhin du gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
translated: Likewise, the formless absorptions are also unchanging and nonconceptual.

original: de bzhin du rnam par thar pa brgyad la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
analyzed: de bzhin du rnam par thar pa brgyad la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
translated: Likewise, the eight liberations are also unchanging and nonconceptual.

original: de bzhin du mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
analyzed: de bzhin du mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
translated: Likewise, the nine serial absorptions are also unchanging and nonconceptual.

original: de bzhin du rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
analyzed: de bzhin du rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
translated: Likewise, the three gates of liberation—emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness—are also unchanging and nonconceptual.

original: de bzhin du mngon par shes pa rnams la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
analyzed: de bzhin du mngon par shes pa rnams la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
translated: Likewise, the five superknowledges are also unchanging and nonconceptual.

original: de bzhin du ting nge 'dzin rnams la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do /
analyzed: de bzhin du ting nge 'dzin rnams la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do /
translated: Likewise, the concentrations are also unchanging and nonconceptual.

original: /de bzhin du gzungs kyi sgo rnams la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
analyzed: /de bzhin du gzungs kyi sgo rnams la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
translated: Likewise, the dhāraṇī gateways are also unchanging and nonconceptual.

original: de bzhin du byams pa chen po la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
analyzed: de bzhin du byams pa chen po la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
translated: In the same way, great love is without change and without conceptualization.

original: de bzhin du snying rje chen po la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
analyzed: de bzhin du snying rje chen po la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
translated: In the same way, great compassion is without change and without conceptualization.

original: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
analyzed: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
translated: In the same way, the ten powers of the tathāgatas are without change and without conceptualization.

original: de bzhin du mi 'jigs pa bzhi la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
analyzed: de bzhin du mi 'jigs pa bzhi la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
translated: In the same way, the four fearlessnesses are without change and without conceptualization.

original: de bzhin du so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam @459b par rtog pa med do //
analyzed: de bzhin du so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam @459b par rtog pa med do //
translated: In the same way, the four detailed and thorough knowledges are without change and without conceptualization.

original: de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
analyzed: de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
translated: In the same way, the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha are without change and without conceptualization.

original: ji ltar sems la 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa de bzhin du rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
analyzed: ji ltar sems la 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa de bzhin du rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
translated: Just as the mind is without change and without conceptualization, in the same way, the result of stream enterer is without change and without conceptualization.

original: de bzhin du lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do; ;de bzhin du phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
analyzed: de bzhin du lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do; ;de bzhin du phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
translated: Similarly, there is no change and no conceptualization in the result of no longer being subject to rebirth.

original: de bzhin du dgra bcom pa nyid la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
analyzed: de bzhin du dgra bcom pa nyid la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
translated: Similarly, there is no change and no conceptualization in arhatship.

original: de bzhin du rang byang chub la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
analyzed: de bzhin du rang byang chub la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
translated: Similarly, there is no change and no conceptualization in individual enlightenment.

original: de bzhin du lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
analyzed: de bzhin du lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
translated: Similarly, there is no change and no conceptualization in the knowledge of path aspects.

original: de bzhin du rnam par thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
analyzed: de bzhin du rnam par thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
translated: Similarly, there is no change and no conceptualization in the knowledge of all aspects.

original: de nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la legs so //🔽zhes bya ba byin te tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
analyzed: de nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la legs so // zhes bya ba byin te tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /

analyzed: legs so // legs so //

analyzed: khyod ni / bcom ldan 'das kyi sras /

analyzed: thugs las skyes pa /

original: zhal nas byung ba /
analyzed: zhal nas byung ba /

analyzed: chos rnams la mngon sum gyi mig dang ldan pa lus mngon du gyur pa ste / nyan thos nyon mongs pa med par rnam par spyod pa rnams @460a *//

original: kyi mchog tu bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs te /
analyzed: kyi mchog tu bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs te /

analyzed: bstan pa 'di'ang de'i tshul dang 'dra'o //

original: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir mi ldog pa'ang 'di las yongs su brtag par bya'o //

original: de ltar na /
analyzed: de ltar na /

analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
translated: Venerable Subhūti,
